name: Deadhand Initiate
text: Your adulation of death not only shields you from your fears, it allows you to feed on them.
prerequisites: Wis 19, Deadhand Styleâ€ , Improved Unarmed Strike, Knowledge (religion) 6 ranks, ki pool class feature, nongood alignment.
benefit:
While using Deadhand Style, as long as you have at least 1 point in your ki pool, your bonus on saving throws against fear effects increases to +4, and the DC of Intimidate checks attempted against you increases by 8.

Additionally, if an enemy targets you with a fear effect, you can spend 1 point from your ki pool as an immediate action to gain a number of temporary hit points equal to twice your Hit Dice.
